resources.string: Click on the edit button to add Apps to this widget.

Note: to display apps in the Widget, enter the package name(s) in the above field. You can enter as mane packages as you want, separated by a comma \",\".\nYou can enter the full package name (com.example.myapp), or a partial package name (com.example.*). We will take care of the rest.\nDo not forget to add a DevDash widget to your home screen.
Widget updated successfully! %s apps added to the Widget
